title: Brutal Doom
description:
Mod to the old Doom games, it will works with Doom 1, Doom 2 and Final Doom.

First of all, go grab the wad files from the Doom games you want to play with this mod and put them inside the folder of the mod. It will be inside the folder of the game, they will be in the same folder as the .exe of the game.

To startplaying, grab the files DoomMetalVol4.wad , dqbrutalv20.pk3 and drag them on top of the file gzdoom. The file DoomMetalVol4.wad is optional, it only changes the soundtrack of the game.

The mod will detected any wad files inside the folder and it will ask you which game you want to play. If you want new weapons in the game, choose the "modern" mode.


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
